scripts.ecr:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 552623730819.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run ecr:login && npm run build:image && npm run tag:image && npm run push:image
scripts.complete:app:core:dev: npm run sam:build:core && npm run deploy:app:core:dev
